page.title: 04The Garage:The Deverills.
page.content: {The Garage}is at the cross-roads in {Longbridge Deverill}opposite the George Inn.The present owner took over the garage in 1951. Since then the {A350}has become a very busy road and the garage has been enlarged three times.The garage has 2 petrol pumps and 1 diesel pump, and serves about 150 customers a day.It also services about 10 cars a day and everything from kettles to combine-harvesters. There are 2 mechanics who work at the garage and there is a receptionist.The garage had a car show-room but this is now a shop selling camping and caravanning accessories.The Garage now also sells and rents caravans . The work-shop has a new hydrauchlic lift and the equipment for servicing and tuning the latest models of car.
